title: Verbal Abuse
body: Hi everyone, i recently got a message after a game saying something along the lines of "You've been reported for verbal abuse, everyone has there bad days please don't take it out on other players" is there any possible way to see what i was actually reported for because i rarely cause trouble or flame anyone and nor did i that game. Cheers, Dildo Out{{item:2047}}

replies.body: that's an automatic message. you can report people for verbal abuse even if they don't say anything and they'll still get it.

Could've just been someone reporting you because they were sour. If you do end up being punished just contact support and, if they're in a good mood, they should be able to let you know exactly why you were punished.

You will get notification if you get some sort of a punishment, but not prior I believe. 

If you are genuinely a good player, don't worry about!
It will be okay.
Its hard to take you seriously when your username is 'Dripping Dildo', no offence
Maybes it's because of your name
